column5: Can anyone tell me how much a case of US beer costs in Fort Frances?
go to http://www.thebeerstore.ca/Beers/Big_ten.asp to find out price
why would you buy us beer in canada when they have sooo many premium brews to choose from??
Will be buying both but wanted to compare prices for US beer against what I can get it here at home.

Trust me.....it's pricier in CA, no matter what you buy. But...I fell in lust with Kokanee a couple years ago, but this year Dutchies was out, so I tried Lakeport, Lakepoint, anyway I now have a new Lust and it is way cheaper!
You can't beat Koakanee! I will be bringing back an extra case or two of it next week.
How much is a case of Koakanee?
